title: Bonus 33 The Twelve Minor Prophets II: Amos and Hosea
itunes:title: Bonus: The Twelve Minor Prophets II: Amos and Hosea
description: In this bonus episode, Steve Guerra and I continue our series on the twelve minor Old Testament prophets. Here we tackle Amos and Hosea. Amos is the perfect pocket prophet. Amos gives you everything you want in a prophet, in a easily digestible form. On the other hand, his near contemporary Hosea is barking mad. Hear all about them in this episode.
content:encoded: In this bonus episode, Steve Guerra and I continue our series on the twelve minor Old Testament prophets. Here we tackle Amos and Hosea. Amos is the perfect pocket prophet. Amos gives you everything you want in a prophet, in a easily digestible form. On the other hand, his near contemporary Hosea is barking mad. Hear all about them in this episode.
itunes:subtitle: Steve Guerra of the podcast History of the Papacy and I continue our series on the twelve minor Old Testament prophets. Here we tackle Amos and Hosea.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens, Steve Guerra
